heal.name: First Aid Med
heal.description: Medicine that fully heals all wounds. Closes gashes and acts as a clotting agent while restoring function to damaged systems.

1911.name: M1911
1911.description: A comfortable *semi*-automatic handgun. Hold down the trigger to fire a continuous string of bullets. (this is a lie)

LEMI.name: LEMI
LEMI.description: A small, easy-to-use semi-automatic pistol with average firing power.

v61.name: V61 Custom
v61.description: A powerful fully automatic machine pistol. Capable of even greater firepower after customization. (it's not full auto in the game tho)

M1897.name: M1897
M1897.description: A pump-action shotgun commonly used for hunting. Well known for its stability and reliability.

W870.name: W870 TAC
W870.description: A pump-action combat shotgun. Has a wide spray that's good for suppressing groups of enemies.

SYG_12.name: SYG-12
SYG_12.description: A semi-automatic shotgun whose focused shots make it powerful against single enemies. Customizable for even more firepower.

sniper.name: F2
sniper.description: A bolt-action sniper rifle. Specialized for taking out long-range targets.

bomb.name: Pipe Bomb
bomb.description: A handmade pipe bomb. When thrown, it explodes violently upon impact or after a set amount of time.

mine.name: Mine
mine.description: A handmade mine. Explodes violently when stepped on.

shotgun_ammo_recipe.name: Recipe: Shotgun Ammo
shotgun_ammo_recipe.description: Learn how to make shotgun ammo using the CRAFTING menu.

sniper_ammo_recipe.name: Recipe: Sniper Rifle Ammo
sniper_ammo_recipe.description: Learn how to make sniper rifle ammo using the CRAFTING menu.

magnum_ammo_recipe.name: Recipe: Magnum Ammo
magnum_ammo_recipe.description: Learn how to make magnum ammo using the CRAFTING menu.

handgun_ammo.name: Handgun Ammo
handgun_ammo.description: 9mm parahellum rounds for a handgun. Generic rounds that have little stopping power, but are easy to handle.

shotgun_ammo.name: Shotgun Ammo
shotgun_ammo.description: 12-gauge shotshells. Each shell has a wide burst, packing a powerful punch.

flashbang_ammo.name: Flashbang
flashbang_ammo.description: Projectile for grenade launchers. Releases a powerful light that dazes enemies.

explosive_ammo.name: Explosive Rounds
explosive_ammo.description: Projectile for grenade launchers. Explosive power that damages a wide area.

magnum_ammo.name: Magnum Ammo
magnum_ammo.description: Fifty-caliber magnum cartridges. Packed with powder for a powerful shot that can pierce most armor.
